vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.2.52; also called Bazlith at Neh.7.54;
§ Bazlith or Bazluth = "asking"
a head of a family of exiles returning with Zerubbabel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: jefe de familia; sirvientes del templo; post exílico
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
巴洗律 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "求問"
跟隨所羅巴伯被擄歸回的一個家族領袖 (拉2:52;尼7:54)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
巴洗律 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "求问"
跟随所罗巴伯被掳归回的一个家族领袖 (拉2:52;尼7:54)
